name: CNM Online
description:
CNM Online is a online multiplayer game where you shoot stuff!

Its got a lot of modding utilities packed right into the game and is just a fun experience overall. Its got a kinda mid 90s pc retro aesthetic stemming from my tastes in video games, and my current skill of low level programming.

Most things like controls are covered in the README.TXT of the game, so I won't go over them here. But besides a few quirks the game is pretty easy to just pick up and play.

Its really just a game made for fun, its not meant to be great but I've had a lot of fun playing and making it so I hope other would too!

Also check out the cool community Discord server too! https://discord.gg/k7qUrwjNC
